page.title: 15Hobbies and Leisure - Ladock
page.content:
I have made a survey of hobbies and past times. I asked three elderly people, five middle-aged people and five children. Here are some of the results:
The most popular was sports because all five{children}liked them. Then collecting posters and stickers and playing darts which three children liked.
{Middle-aged}people liked walking, looking after dogs, knitting, playing the piano, keep fit, reading, gardening, decorating,flower arranging, sport and flying aeroplanes
The{old people}liked W.I., gardening, walking, Rainbow Club, knitting and making things.
